long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension enhances your MTG shopping by adding functionality to mtggoldfish.com and cardmarket.com.

MTGGOLDFISH:
- see prices in euros, both the exact and cheapest version of the cards
- save deck lists directly to your device
- pin deck lists

CARDMARKET:
- see the trend price of cards while browsing user inventories
- see which prices are below or above your preferred price reference (trend or 1/7/30 day average)
- camera icons converted to card image
- adds direct link to an user's card inventory
- experimental feature: adds link to the cards in Shopping Wizard results
